name: DSA Corporation
description:
[DSA Coporation]
The  Evil DSA Corp group, they force you to play tug of war... in space !
To win, you climb. but beware as other victims of the DSA don't want to be eliminated and will fight over the rope, that rope being the only thing allowing you to escape to victory.  
So get a rope, climb, don't fall and win ! 


DSA Coporation is a miltiplayer party game best enjoyed with friends. 
Time Constrants limited features like Npc's/Bots to fight against as well as other things.
[Features] ------------------------
- All the game is based on two buttons !
- You can play solo or up to 4 lan mutliplayers, though without npcs, whom might come in another update later on. its best experianced with friends. 

- Random handcrafted levels
[Context] -------------------------
This game was originally made by jacobsmith3204 and Deceleris for the 2 Buttons game jam, in one week =)
[Support] -------------------------
Make it more fun and share the game with your friends ! 
We've took a lot of time to create this game, comments are really appreciated. We look forward to your feedback.
